website_summaries.verdict: Number 1 over the counter relief for those who get severe, face-swelling reactions to poison ivy, sumac, or oak.
pros: Unlike other products, this doesn't just treat symptoms  like itch and redness
It actually removes urushiol from the skin so you don't re-infect yourself
Works particularly well on the face and genitals
Safe for pregnant women and children
Half the cost of another popular product that has the exact same ingredients
cons: Pricey, but well worth the cost for anyone whose face swells up when they have a run-in with poisonous plants

customer_reviews.title: The BEST poison oak remedy
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is miraculous. There is no other product that helps clear up poison oak as quickly as Zanfel. I will never buy a different remedy.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It works!! Such relief!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I’m not sure if you can see in the photo, but I have poison ivy blisters on top of blisters and raging itchiness. Was in agony. This product truly stopped my itching and is helping dry up my blisters. It works in seconds. The itchiness subsided for about 4-5 hours then I reapply. Relief from this torture is well worth the high price. I just used it today for the first time and have already told tons of friends. I am so grateful for this product. I didn’t sleep at all last night then fell asleep immediately after using it early this morning. Ahhh. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Barber

customer_reviews.title: arrived on time, in my opinion doesn't work anywhere ...
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time, in my opinion doesn't work anywhere near as well as described and price is to high. If it worked as they say then it would be worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: did not work as described
customer_reviews.text: I went through 4 tubes before giving up lye soap clearing it up
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing
customer_reviews.text: It works. Must follow the directions perfectly but it definitely works. If your poison rash is big enough you can get body chills as you’re using this because it feels so good
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Zanfel helped clear up my poison ivy
customer_reviews.text: The Zanfel helped clear up my poison ivy that kept spreading. Zanfel was recommended to my by my doctor's office.
customer_reviews.author: S McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product works great to minimize the effects of poison ivy. You MUST follow instructions EXACTLY, or don't waste your money. We have tried many, many other products and this is the best we have used.
customer_reviews.author: RAV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best wash or our family. A little pricey but it works!
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Finally relief from poison ivy!
customer_reviews.text: I get poison ivy horribly. I've taken steroids for it multiple times. Typically it's a minimum 2-3 week endeavor of discomfort, expecting it to be over soon but spreading instead. This product not only relieves the itching but accelerates the healing to 2-3 days. The sooner you use it the sooner it will begin to heal. Using it will make the rash appear to worsen, however within 24 hours it will begin to recede. I recommend to all of my friends/family that deals with the poison plants.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only non prescription product that i have found that works on poison ivy. I live on 2+ acres and poison ivy is everywhere. All I have to do is look at it and I get infected. This product is for use after the outbreak has happened. Follow the simple directions and you'll be amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Joe White

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic At Preventing Rash Caused By Poison Ivy
customer_reviews.text: This product is somewhat on the expensive side, especially considering the size. It lasts me about five treatments, but, it works! It prevents the poison ivy rash almost entirely, you just have to be diligent and hop in the shower and apply as directed once you have been exposed. I even apply on the second day, just to be safe. It is not as effective if you already have a full blown rash.
customer_reviews.author: JLC740

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients incorrectly listed and volume is not realistic
customer_reviews.text: Ingredients are printed on box that it includes polyethylene but sticker added to box later says that it does not contain polyethylene. Not nearly enough to treat the "15 areas the size of an adult hand or face" if directions are followed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lessens the itch and speeds recovery
customer_reviews.text: The only product that helped me thru horrible posion sumac. I didn't know about this product before getting posion sumac so I didn't have it for the immidate washing once exposed, but now I keep some at home always. I had a really bad exposure this was a life saver
customer_reviews.author: S. A. keith

customer_reviews.title: I always have a tube of ready.
customer_reviews.text: This works better than topical steroids. This reduces pain by 50% on the first application, and 80% on the second. It cuts down the rash from 2 weeks to 3-5 days. I always have a tube ready to go. I get poison Ivey about 5 times a year, and this is by far the best topical solution. The only thing that works better is oral steroids.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula
customer_reviews.text: I am highly allergic to any type of poison, and this product has always been my saving grace but unfortunately the formula has changed and it is not nearly as effective as before and it makes me want to cry because now if I get it I know I have to suffer as I have been using this multiple times a day now for 3 days and very little progress on the sumac that I currently have please bring back the original formula
customer_reviews.author: Leah Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t touch my poison ivy
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t do much for my poison ivy . I had this that I got from a drug store I was using before , that worked great. This stuff didn’t seem to touch it .. not sure if it’s the same cream or a knock off that amazon has been famous for drawing now
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Does it work? Maybe...maybe not. Are there any controlled studies?!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly expensive for what it promises. You get maybe 2 shower applications from this container. I would recommend the TecNu scrub and spray over this.
customer_reviews.author: The jazz cat

customer_reviews.title: Clears up fast
customer_reviews.text: This wash is the fastest at getting rid of poison ivy rash. I'm highly allergic! I tried to clear it up with just itch cream and a pink lotion and while it does help with the itch - it took more than a week and repeated applications every day to go away. With Zanfel wash, it took 2-3 days to clear up - Depending on Severity of infection. The sooner you use this, the faster it clears up and stops itching. The scrub may feel a bit strange, but you soon discover it relieving the itch and redness after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Jecca

customer_reviews.title: This WORKS like magic to heal your Poison Ivy/Oak!
customer_reviews.text: So, yes...it's v. expensive and totally worth it. I'm incredibly sensitive to Poison Ivy/Oak and had a severe case that went systemic, I have tried EVERYTHING to dry it out [Grindelia tincture, Isopropyl Alcohol Wipes, Pepcid AC -an H2 histamine blocker because I'm allergic to steroids- in an effort to calm my histamine response, Fels Naptha & Tecnu Scrub (which worked pretty well too)] and those all brought relief to an extent but this has helped it clear up in a matter of days. Sweet relief! If you're in doubt, trust me, it's worth it to feel so much better so quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally!  Something that works right away!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a product to rid the annoying itching from poison ivy, oak or sumac then this is what you want to purchase. Don’t let the product cost scare you away. It works almost immediately! And it will be gone within just days with noticeable difference each day. I keep one in my cabinet for the next time I need it. This stuff actually works!
customer_reviews.author: poe

customer_reviews.title: Love Zanfel
customer_reviews.text: Zanfel is the only product I will use for poison ivy exposure. I am incredibly sensitive to poison ivy and have had huge, seeping rashes. Now, as soon as I realize I’ve touched poison ivy, or if I see a small bump on my arm or leg, I apply the Zanfel according to package directions and the rash is stopped in its tracks. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Preemptive purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought Zanfel preemptively on the recommendation of a co-worker who has used it many times when her kids were exposed to poison ivy. I’ve given it 5 star ratings based on her experience. It’s expensive (but it’s almost twice as much at CVS), however, when you have the itching, burning rash of poison ivy, poison oak or poison sumac, you’re willing to pay whatever to get relief. Hoping to not have to use it but will let you know what happens if I do need it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Tavares

customer_reviews.title: Even though I didn't believe it, it does work
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately I haven't had to use it yet, but my son did. He found it worked as advertised. I was skeptical, but he convinced me it really did stop the itching following the directions and healing started quickly.
customer_reviews.author: delump

customer_reviews.title: This wash works!
customer_reviews.text: I am a chronic Poison ivy sufferer. I recently did not realize my contact and it took a couple of days to get the Zanfel delivered... then overnight relief. I did use it a second time to treat areas I had not realized were impacted. Very good instructions , which I followed and ... voila within 10 minutes relief of the itching and over the next 2 days the rash completely vanished!
customer_reviews.author: Pearly

customer_reviews.title: It really works if you follow the directions
customer_reviews.text: I used it for poison ivy, and it really helped it stopped the itchiness right a way. It didn’t cause my legs to have the small bubbles with liquid inside that’s usually Associated with poison ivy... Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works takes a day or so but I am extremely sensitive to poison oak!
customer_reviews.text: First off this is the best poison oak wash available! My only issue being that I own land in the Santa Cruz mountains is that it only comes in a 1 oz tube and it is extremely expensive no mater where you look! I would buy it by the 55 gallon barrel if I could!
customer_reviews.author: eli fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Relief that Works
customer_reviews.text: One of the few over the counter ivy treatment that brings relief! For those “lucky” (sarcasm) enough where this wonderful rash spreads everywhere within 24 hrs of contact 🥵 requiring shots & pills of steroids from Dr. This is a must to bind with urushiol to wash away dreadful itching & help actually dry it up! And I’ve tried everything out there! Highly Recommend 😍
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Grossly overpriced, yet effective.
customer_reviews.text: Product relies on exploiting the customer's desperate need for relief in order to charge such an exorbitant price. Immediate and thorough use of dish soap and a wash cloth are the way to go. That being said, this product does offer relief and is useful once the rash has set in.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I now seem to get poison ivy easily - sometimes I think all I have to do is look at a poison ivy plant. I have a neighbor that seems to farm it so I am often finding it in my yard. I keep Zanfel in stock just in case. The package arrived in great shape and on time and the price was phenomenal. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but not really for my severe reaction
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat worked. Hard to tell as the poison ivy became severe after taking this. I don’t attribute that happening by using this product. Could it have been worse ? Not sure. Ended up having to take steroids to combat the poison ivy. Might be a good product to mild to medium poison ivy rashes. My case, I believe, was outside of a what this product could handle. Overall it kinda helped.
customer_reviews.author: Nucc

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I got a fairly severe case of poison ivy about two weeks ago, and it didn't seem to be getting better after a few days of applying Ivarest. The difference overnight after using this product was pretty amazing. I'm not completely healed yet, but I am still really impressed with the efficacy (there's a fifty cent word!) of Zanfel. Expensive... and worth every penny for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: Blave

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Tried five other treatments including baking soda and calamine and prescription ointment from dermatologist. Zanfel worked best. I ordered more just to have a reserve for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Murley

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me - won't use again
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions on the box to a T, and used a few times on the same spot in subsequent hours/days as recommended. Did not work. Would temporarily relieve itching for about 30 mins, then go right back to being itchy. I don't count myself as highly allergic to poison ivy, but this last bout has been the worst (got it from our beagle) and has not healed for over 2 weeks. Back to using creams and apple cider vinegar. Very sad this product did not work at all, since it was so expensive for such a tiny tube.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Works so very good.
customer_reviews.text: Will never be without it. Best I have ever used baring none. Will always have a tube in each bathroom. Excellant
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Worth $100 a bottle
customer_reviews.text: One bottle enabled me to apply the cream two full times, then I anxiously waited for blisters that never appeared. I did not have to buy anything else including: bandages, calamine lotion, or allergy medicine. I did not even miss a day of work. Worth every penny and more.
customer_reviews.author: Birthday Gift Idea

customer_reviews.title: poison ivy relief
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years at a certified wildlife habitat residence. It works better than anything else I can find. It wash with it after being around poison ivy but is still works even if you use it after poison ivy breaks out. Very expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: rabbitreviewer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: If you've got poison oak or ivy, you want fast relief, and so far this is the only product I've found that works. It's pricy, but you get a product that really will remove the oil and end the itching. Great for kids too, to stop the inevitable scratching and damage they'll do to their skin without some relief. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Best poison ivy treatment there is
customer_reviews.text: This is the best there is for poison ivy. I had it so badly my skin was thick like leather and oozing 100%. Because mine was was so bad, it took a day & half to stop oozing & dry up. Last time I had it this bad it took over a week to dry up this much
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really  workes if you do it right You have to rinse it with  hot water that all broken oil  s
customer_reviews.text: It really works. My poison ivy bite was out of control until I got this Zanfel. Treat my foot in two days. You have to rinse it with hot water that all broken oil would come out and slide out from your body. that's what helped me.
customer_reviews.author: Amex Business

customer_reviews.title: Zanfel is a great product
customer_reviews.text: Zanfel is a great product that works well, every time I need it. It arrived quickly. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Strong SW

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but not 5 stars due to price
customer_reviews.text: It's a miracle in a tube. My mom is severely allergic and had a spot on her face. She used this as directed (you don't need as much as directed so don't overuse a little bit goes a very long way) and did it twice and it was gone the next day. It's super pricey so it only gets 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Beezer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best stuff
customer_reviews.text: I get poison ivy every year & sometimes twice a year & until my wife found Zanfel I used to suffer with it for almost a week. Zanfel works great & it eleviates the inching & burning within a couple of days. I won’t use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Wiliams

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I've found for treating poison ivy/oak. My husband works in construction and is sensitive to poison ivy and this is the only product I've found that actually works for him. Used as soon as you know you've come in contact with it, this product seriously reduces the reaction. Even if it's been a couple of days it's still dries out the rash and clears up the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Starfish

customer_reviews.title: Go to Walgreens
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced, did have some effectiveness should be 2 oz for the price,90 bucks for 2 go to doctor get a cortiszone shot if you have allergy to poison ivy. Walgreens sells like product for 30 bucks as effective and you can get same day if you are in discomfort
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Helps with the itch from poison ivy
customer_reviews.text: This worked to take away the itch from my son’s severe case of poison ivy. It did not make the rash go away. We needed oral steroids and steroid cream and a trip to the doctor for that. But it was worth it to take away the itching.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Six

customer_reviews.title: Only product that's worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I feel compelled to do so for this product. I get poison ivy every summer, despite my best efforts. I have tried prescription steroids and products on the market and nothing works quite like this. I currently have it on my arms, legs and hands. Over the course of two days, using the product twice, the itch has completely faded. I still have a very unsightly poison ivy rash, but I'll take that over the pain and itch! For those of you who are highly allergic or super susceptible, trust me, it's worth the price and worth trying!
customer_reviews.author: cgwritesareview

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for milder cases of poison ivy
customer_reviews.text: This product temporarily eases the itch of poison ivy, but for those of us who have strong allergic responses, who react systemically to the oil toxin with achy, swollen, deep tissue lumps that continue to surface day after day, a trip to the dr and a prescription for cortisone/prednisone is necessary, the sooner the better. If you are suffering, see a doctor right away.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Allen

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me and this was very expensive. Paid very close attention to the directions and followed them to the t. Got 1 use out of the tube before it was empty. Not worth the money to me
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It works very fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product whenever I come in contact with wild parsnip. It works fast and is very easy to apply. Be sure to read directions since it is not a cheap lotion. I have used Zanfel for many years and am not looking to try anything else. Absolutely, couldn't be without it. It was shipped to me quickly which is really important when you have been in contact with poison ivy or wild parsnip. Absolutely would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: gardengirl

customer_reviews.title: Solves my poison ivy quickly
customer_reviews.text: I used to get poison ivy that lasted for weeks. This stuff takes it down to 1 or 2 days. It's worth the cost for me.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to spend that money for a product that might not work. For the first time I got ivy poison and it was on my face. My face was swollen and extremely red. I used the Zenfel and I could not believe it. The itch disappeared immediately. By the next day, it was gone. This is the first product that I have used that did what it claimed. I am amazed. Hard to believe but I found out for myself. THANK YOU Everyone needs to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M. Shea

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: Last time I had poison ivy, I had to go to the doctor's to get steroids. While pulling weeds, while wearing gloves, I pulled poison ivy out by the roots, thinking this would eradicate the poison ivy, but apparently was in contact with the plant. Watching it slowly spread, I tried this and it works like magic. Had to use a few times, the the itch went away and the rash dried. It is very expensive and hopefully I won't need some in the near future, but I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Manson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent topical to eliminate rash from Poison Oak, Poison Ivy, Sumac
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely allergic to these poison plants. Zanfel is the only product to significantly reduce itching, blistering rash and greatly reduces recovery time. Must use as directed for best results.
customer_reviews.author: TFreeman

customer_reviews.title: Works but not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I got poison Ivy badly little while ago and decided to got this product to help. It helped the itch for less than a hour and the portion size is so small you wont have enough to use more than 2x only on arms and face. Wasnt impressed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Bigtim

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of poison ivory
customer_reviews.text: Product works well. Removes oil from poison ivory Sumac. If u wash with it right away with cool water the duration is shorter. Recommend Price is slightly high but would still recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works where nothing else does.
customer_reviews.text: this is the only poison ivy treatment that really works. We are thankful for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bender

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I used it the first morning on my poison ivy. No itching for almost 24 hours. Used it one more time and that was it. No further itching. Took a while for the rash to heal. I usually end up at the doctor and taking steroids. As a nurse, I was skeptical. Especially with the price. So glad I tried the product!! Well worth the price paid!
customer_reviews.author: jmitchem

customer_reviews.title: OMG THIS WORKS
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE FIRST PRODUCT THAT ACTAULLY WORKS TO GET RID OF IT. I HAVE GOTTEN POSION IVY 5 TIMES WHILE TRYING TO GET RID OF IT ON MY PROPERTY THIS MAN DOES THIS WORK. I HAVE GOTTEN RID OF IT WITHIN 2-3 DAYS AND IT DOESNT MAKE IT SPREAD.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Poison Ivy? This works!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for colleague who had poison ivy and it REALLY worked. She said it took the itch, the redness away. Good solution to this problem.
customer_reviews.author: charmaine

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Had a poison ivy attack on arms, upper right leg, and a 50 cent size on stomach and this wash after just one use helped a lot. Applied the scrub 3 more times and it was greatly on way to gone. Best product I have used. Got some for just in case use and would not hesitate to use again. Thanks for a great product. Only wish it was in at least a 2 oz tube size.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Stops the itch!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very allergic to poison ivy/oak. This has helped stop the itch and seems to be helping dry up the rash. Usually have to get steroid shots
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stewart

customer_reviews.title: What you need if you get poison ivy
customer_reviews.text: I discovered Zanfel several years ago after getting poison ivy for the first time. I am now a frequent flyer, I get it every summer, and this is what gets me through. Can't suggest it enough!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Cargill

customer_reviews.title: Use immediately after exposure to Poison Ivy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was exposed to Poison Ivy. Had I known about it and used it immediately, I probably would have had better results. I'd never heard of it until 5 days after exposure and by the time it arrived, it had been a week of itching and scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: absolutely the best i’ve found for poison ivy
customer_reviews.text: If you are unlucky enough to come in contact with poison ivy or poison oak, this is your savior! even if the oil has caused a rash or even boils, Zanfel will remove the oil, relieve the itching and let you get back healing
customer_reviews.author: Damon Gold

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product works amazing for Poison Ivy!! I cannot say enough about how well this works to get rid of the annoying itching feeling from poison ivy. You might have to use it a couple times a day at the beginning but it definitely keeps you from wanting to rip all your skin off because of the itching. If you follow the directions it gives you immediate relief.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dumb Survey
customer_reviews.text: This is a wash for poison ivy, oak & sumak....it has no thickness, warmth or sheerness and I don't think you want to see a picture of what I had! This survey makes no sense! As rated above, the zanfel product worked wonderful. I was super glad I had it on hand when the poison junk returned for a 2nd & 3rd time due to landscaping and yard work!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Jo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my itching immediately
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but it stopped my itching immediately, even though it was four days after my rash appeared (pretty bad too) before I used the Zanfel Instructions are clear and explicit, follow them and your itching will be gone and you’ll be a bit poorer.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Ice

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Worked well. I would recommend it. Released itching almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Ann

customer_reviews.title: Advanced Poison Oak Treament, Zanfel
customer_reviews.text: Its better in the preliminary stages of poison oak. I had more developed attack of poison oak so it worked ok scrubbing some of the areas of the skin but if finally came down to calamine lotion for the itch an a prescription of Perrigo triamcinolone Acetonide cream. That did the trick for more developed poison oak. Zanfel is a bit on the expensive side for 1 oz. which in my case was not enough to cover all the area of my skin that needed treatment.
customer_reviews.author: John Clayson Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but very costly
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive. Instructions say to use 1 1/2" each time you use it. It says the product will not work when using less. I volunteer outdoors during the summer months and usually get Poison Ivy at least once a year. Because of the cost, I started using smaller amounts and have not seen a significant difference in how the product works.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas F. Payne

customer_reviews.title: ... that the scrubbing helped ease the itching for a pretty long stretch of time
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it speeds up recovery but I did find that the scrubbing helped ease the itching for a pretty long stretch of time. Be careful to be gentle and I don't recommend scrubbing for up to 3 minutes like the instructions indicate, even if it still feels itchy. I popped some blisters that way. Technu scrub doesn't have as much grit, but is a LOT cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Z.

customer_reviews.title: IT REALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Great for poison ivy. Had a bad case and it took care of it! Finally the itch stopped. Works better than anything else I tried. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: koolcactus

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap I am so thankful someone made this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap I am so thankful someone made this stuff. I've had poison oak bad before, SOOOOO MISERABLE! But this time I used this stuff and it stopped the progression and the itch cold.! Cant say enough how glad i am. Expensive, but for the suffering it saves, have to concede that it is worth it. Side note, make sure your follow the instructions for best results.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: So happy I found this!!
customer_reviews.text: For anyone suffering like I do with poison ivy I can highly recommend this product. I was in agony when a neighbor recommended it to me and it really is fantastic. My reaction was so bad that it took a tube and a half to really work but the relief came after the first treatment. So pleased to have discovered this and the price here is very good. I shall keep a tube on standby from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product to anyone, it didn't do anything for me, I got better results from Ivarest poisin ivy spray that I picked up at Wal-Mart. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Durval

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with good results
customer_reviews.text: It was important for me to have clear written directions along with the visual text to use this product and I found this extremely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Garland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent treatment for skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: I found out about this stuff a few months ago, and it works great. It takes the itch right out of poison ivy; bad cases may need multiple treatments, but I am sold on this product. It is a bit expensive, but it is worth every penny.

customer_reviews.title: Zanfel is the best product on the market for poison oak.
customer_reviews.text: There is no other product that is even close to Zanfel- for itch relief and shortening duration of poison oak. Take it from someone who always ended up on prednisone and with cortisone shots. Habent done either since I discovered Zanfel.

customer_reviews.title: ZANFEL WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions by wetting the affected area, work the cream into a paste, apply to the affected area and rub the paste in until the ITCH STOPS. This is the only treatment that works for me.

customer_reviews.title: It does EXACTLY what it claims to do!
customer_reviews.text: So this is an expensive tube of treatment for poison ivy! But I will never go camping without it again and will gladly pay this price! It was recommended by my pharmacist and it did EXACTLY what it claims to do! I am hypersensitive to Poison Ivy where “I just look at it” and break out in a rash all over; this is the best treatment I have ever used!

customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great to stop the itching. Maybe not if it is all over your body but local application is excellent!

customer_reviews.text: I get poison ivy by just looking at it, I swear! Zander works every single time. Its a small tube & expensive but I will buy it every time because it does work

customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: If you are tired of going to the doctor to get pills or shots for poison oak then this is the product for you. I suffer the worst out of all of my coworkers and I work in parks with a lot of poison oak. I get it often. If you did not catch the oak in the initial scrub then use this to cut the healing time in half. This stuff wont make it erase off your skin but it will soothe and then dry it out so that you don't feel miserable and it heals fast. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: By the time I found this product on a recommendation from a friend my case of poison ivy was severe. I had to go on a month of prednisone. That said I still used the product and received a lot of relief from the itching. I used it twice a day.

customer_reviews.title: Great help for poison ivy
customer_reviews.text: My husband processes wood and often gets poison ivy. This has been his only relief without going to the doctor
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased. My rash was moderate and a few days ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised, I was very pleased. My rash was moderate and a few days old, but my prior rashes with poison ivy extended to 10 days or so. This time the itch went away a few minutes into the application and the swelling went away after a couple of days. Getting rid of the itch was well worth the cost. One thing puzzles me is that the directions required that each application requires a minimum quantity (1.5 inch) of the product; and stresses this is required for the product to work. I did ignore this direction and used a smaller amount as one area of infection was very small. The product still worked.
customer_reviews.author: splibrarian

customer_reviews.title: It really helped...
customer_reviews.text: Was riddled with PI: blisters, rash, itching. Really miserable. This stuff actually stopped the itching! In recovery and highly recommend this for those inflicted with bad case of PI. Note: still recommend seeing MD if blistering occurs!
customer_reviews.author: jeper2

product_meta.title: Zanfel Poison Ivy, Poison Oak, and Sumac Wash (1 Oz. Tube) (3)
feature_bullets: RELIEF FROM POISON IVY, POISON OAK & SUMAC: Zanfel Poison Ivy, Oak & Sumac Wash is a safe and effective topical solution for the reaction caused by exposure to poison ivy, poison oak, and sumac.
PERFECT FOR EVERYONE: Zanfel Poison Ivy, Oak & Sumac Wash is perfect for everyone! This safe formulation can be safely used by children, pregnant and nursing women.
CAN BE USED ANY TIME AFTER EXPOSURE: Zanfel Poison Ivy, Oak & Sumac Wash can be used at any time after exposure, on any external body area, including the face and genitals.
RELIEF IN 30 SECONDS: When used correctly, Zanfel Poison Ivy, Oak & Sumac Wash relieves itching and pain caused by urushiol within about 30 seconds!

EFFECTIVELY REMOVES URUSHIOL: While regular products temporarily reduce itching but do nothing to remove urushiol, Zanfel treats the problem, not just the symptoms. It works to effectively remove urushiol from your skin by binding with it to create an aggregated cluster, which can quickly and effectively be washed away with water.
